## StandardExtrudedLineTechniqueParams interface

Declares a a geometry as a standard extruded line.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface StandardExtrudedLineTechniqueParams extends StandardTechniqueParams, PolygonalTechniqueParams 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [caps](./harp-datasource-protocol.standardextrudedlinetechniqueparams.caps.md) | [DynamicProperty](./harp-datasource-protocol.dynamicproperty.md)<!-- -->&lt;"None" \| "Circle"&gt; | Style of both end caps. Possible values: <code>&quot;None&quot;</code>, <code>&quot;Circle&quot;</code>. A value of undefined maps to <code>&quot;Circle&quot;</code>. |
|  [lineWidth](./harp-datasource-protocol.standardextrudedlinetechniqueparams.linewidth.md) | [DynamicProperty](./harp-datasource-protocol.dynamicproperty.md)<!-- -->&lt;number&gt; | Width of a line in meters for different zoom levels. |
|  [shading](./harp-datasource-protocol.standardextrudedlinetechniqueparams.shading.md) | "standard" | A value determining the shading technique. Valid values are <code>&quot;basic&quot;</code> and <code>&quot;standard&quot;</code>. Default is <code>&quot;basic&quot;</code>.<code>&quot;basic&quot;</code> : Simple shading, faster to render. Only simple color and opacity are effective. <code>&quot;standard&quot;</code> : Elaborate shading, with metalness, and roughness. |
